programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: At mid-season, Kai Lenny heads to Alaska for surf and snow heli sessions with snowboarding icon Travis Rice. (24 minutes)

programme.title: Proving ground (part 1)
programme.desc: The Eddie is on and Kai Lenny has plenty to prove on the North Shore of Oahu at both Pipeline and Waimea Bay. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Proving ground (part 2)
programme.desc: Kai Lenny chases a dream win at The Eddie then takes on the World Tour’s best pro surfers at Sunset Beach. (22 minutes)

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Kai Lenny's balancing act looks different in 2023, and his home life and performance goals are ready to reset. (17 minutes)

programme.title: Rescue
programme.desc: Kai Lenny kicks off the big wave season at Jaws and faces the risks that come with his pursuit of progression. (26 minutes)

programme.title: Tahiti
programme.desc: Michel Bourez and Kauli Vaast take you on a tour of beautiful islands of Tahiti. (24 minutes)

programme.title: No Contest: Surfing San Francisco
programme.desc: Dive into the fray and get to meet one of surfing’s most hardcore communities. (25 minutes)

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: Ashton Goggans guides you through Morocco to discover why it's one of surfing’s fastest growing hotspots. (23 minutes)

programme.title: South Africa
programme.desc: Let Ashton Goggans be your tour guide along South Africa’s wave-rich coastline from Durban to Cape Town. (25 minutes)

programme.title: The Next Centimeter
programme.desc: Discover what it takes for pole vaulter Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis to raise the bar – one centimetre at a time. (26 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru Australia
programme.desc: Donavon Frankenreiter, Benji Weatherley and Rob Machado head Down Under on a two-week surfing journey. (48 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru Australia 2
programme.desc: Spend two insane weeks driving and surfing through some of Australia’s most incredible coastlines. (58 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru California
programme.desc: Donavon Frankenreiter, Timmy Curran, Greg Browning and Shawn Barron journey down the coast of California. (39 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru Caribbean
programme.desc: Donavon Frankenreiter, Benji Weatherley, Pat O'Conell and Kalani Robb search for waves in the Caribbean. (38 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru Europe
programme.desc: Follow Kelly Slater, Benji Weatherley, Pat O'Connell and Ry Craike on their surf adventure through Europe. (36 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru Japan
programme.desc: Donavon Frankenrieter, Rob Machado, Benji Wheatherley and Shawn Barron search for waves in Japan. (37 minutes)

programme.title: Drive Thru South Africa
programme.desc: Donavon Frankenreiter, Benji Weatherley, Pat O'Connell, Mike Losness and more drive across South Africa. (56 minutes)

programme.title: The Next Centimeter
programme.desc: Discover what it takes for pole vaulter Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis to raise the bar – one centimetre at a time. (26 minutes)

programme.title: Chumbo: Made for Big Wave Surfing
programme.desc: Get a glimpse into Lucas Chianca's life as he balances chasing big waves with looking after his family. (40 minutes)
